loanProducts.title: Home Loan
loanProducts.shortDescription: Buy or build your dream home with Vinayaka Finserv’s Home Loan.
loanProducts.details: Borrow from ₹5 Lakhs to ₹5 Crores with long-term flexible repayment options.

loanProducts.title: Personal Loan
loanProducts.shortDescription: Quick and easy Personal Loans for your immediate financial needs.
loanProducts.details: Borrow from ₹50,000 to ₹25 Lakhs with minimal documentation.

loanProducts.title: Education Loan
loanProducts.shortDescription: Finance your higher studies in India or abroad with our Education Loan.
loanProducts.details: Borrow from ₹1 Lakh to ₹40 Lakhs with student-friendly repayment plans.

loanProducts.title: Vehicle Loan
loanProducts.shortDescription: Get easy loans for purchasing two-wheelers, cars, or commercial vehicles.
loanProducts.details: Borrow from ₹1 Lakh to ₹50 Lakhs with competitive interest rates.

loanProducts.title: Loan Against Property (LAP)
loanProducts.shortDescription: Unlock the value of your property to get funds for any purpose.
loanProducts.details: Borrow from ₹5 Lakhs to ₹10 Crores by mortgaging residential or commercial property.

loanProducts.title: Gold Loan
loanProducts.shortDescription: Instant Gold Loans with high value for your gold ornaments.
loanProducts.details: Borrow from ₹10,000 to ₹50 Lakhs at low-interest rates with quick processing.

loanProducts.title: Business Loan / MSME Loan
loanProducts.shortDescription: Grow and expand your business with our Business/MSME Loan.
loanProducts.details: Borrow from ₹2 Lakhs to ₹2 Crores with flexible repayment and low paperwork.

loanProducts.title: Agriculture Loan (KCC / Crop Loan)
loanProducts.shortDescription: Loans for farmers to manage crop production and seasonal expenses.
loanProducts.details: Borrow from ₹25,000 to ₹10 Lakhs with subsidized interest rates.

loanProducts.title: Top-up Loan
loanProducts.shortDescription: Get additional funds on your existing loan through our Top-up facility.
loanProducts.details: Borrow extra amounts based on your repayment history and existing loan eligibility.

loanProducts.title: Balance Transfer Loan
loanProducts.shortDescription: Reduce your EMI by transferring your existing loan to Vinayaka Finserv.
loanProducts.details: Transfer loans up to ₹2 Crores with lower EMIs and better interest rates.
